content:
@Keith Boone @Divya Ahuja
14808 A flag to indicate if new time is proposed by participant

Summary: A flag to indicate if new time is proposed by participant

Epic doesn't really have a use for AppointmentResponse, but I can see how Outloook-style scheduling systems might want to apply the "decline and propose alternate time" workflow.

Do others have opinions?

that would require the participant to have access to the other participants schedules to propose a new time, right? Not sure this would be within the 80% of scheduling systems, but given the fact we based this resource on iCal it might be a logical thing to add. Interested to hear other opinions too.

They can request one that works for them though ;)
And proposing an alternative time as a result shouldn't affect the appointment unless they are the co-ordinator of the appointment.
